title: Azhage Azhage Lyrics  Ok Ok Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:  Azhage Azhage
Singers : Mukesh, Sri Madhumitha
Lyrics : Na.Muthukumar

Movie : Ok ok
Music : Harrish Jeyaraj

Azhage azhage
azhagin azhage neeyadi..
Un arugae arugae
azhagaai tholainthen naanadi..

Aayindhe nimidam
ayindhe nimidam thanadi..
En aasai nenjil
patrikondathu theeyadi..

Naan enna
ennavo kanavugal kanden
Ennai unnidam
thanthida vanthen
vandha vegathil thayakkam konden

Nee thoondil kaaranai
thindridum meena
veetai aalanai
venridum maana
unnai nesitha kadhalan naana?

Vaa kaniye, mukkaniye
theeyodum paniye
varamal nee sendral
ivan thaniye thaniye..

vaa kaniye.. mukkaniye
theeyodum paniye
unakkaga urundodum
ivan kalam iniye..
Azhage azhage ...

Suda suda nerupena paarthaai
kulirnthida marupadi paarthaai
kangal irandum kadhal sollum
Irundhum nadithaai..

Adikkadi mullena thaithaai
aayinum poovena poopaai
idhya kadhavai erakkam kondu
enakkai thirappaai..

Indha kadhal enbathu
oru mazhalai pondrathu
adhu sinunga sinungathan
kavanam pirakkum..

Unnai kenji ketkiren..
ennai konja ketkiren
nee ketka marukkirai..
thodarnthu nadikkiraai

unakkum enakkum naduvil
kadhal valam vara…

kaniye, mukkaniye
theeyodum paniye
varamal nee sendral
ivan thaniye thaniye..

vaa kaniye.. mukkaniye
theeyodum paniye
unakkaga urundodum
ivan kalam iniye..

Pala pala kanavukal irukku..
athai yen sollanum unakku..
manasuvittu pesa neeyum..
nanbana enakku

Paarthu pidithu unakku..
pazhakida thonanum enakku..
kaanal neeril meenaithedi
alaivathu yetharku?

Nee kovil theradi..
marakilaiyum naanadi
ennai kadanthu pogaiyil..
norunguthu nenjam

nee kadhal ghajiniya?
pagal kanavil pavaniya?

yen thurathi varukiraai…
nerunga ninaikirai
unakkum enakkum yethirkka
kadhal valam vara…

kaniye.. mukkaniye
theeyodum paniye
varamal nee sendral
ivan thaniye thaniye..
vaa kaniye,,mukkaniye
theeyodum paniye
unakkaga urundodum
ivan kalam iniye

Azhage azhage
azhagin azhage neeyadi..
Un arugae arugae
azhagaai tholainthen naanadi..

Aayindhe nimidam
ayindhe nimidam thanadi..
En aasai nenjil
patrikondathu theeyadi..

Naan enna
ennavo kanavugal kanden
Ennai unnidam
thanthida vanthen
vandha vegathil thayakkam konden

Nee thoondil kaaranai
thindridum meena
veetai aalanai
venridum maana
unnai nesitha kadhalan naana?

Vaa kaniye, mukkaniye
theeyodum paniye
varamal nee sendral
ivan thaniye thaniye..
vaa kaniye.. mukkaniye
theeyodum paniye
unakkaga urundodum
ivan kalam iniye..  (2)
